patterns: How can I go to the programming center and meet with an educator?
What should I bring with me for the appointment?
How do I schedule an appointment on ProCenter?
responses: You can get help with any topic related to CSE courses by book an appointment ,and take any materials with you
You should first make an appointment and you can bring with you any materials you need.
choose the educator you want to book with and take your notes with you in programming center.

patterns: What are the features of ProCenter?
responses: It's an online booking appointment website that helps students to book sessions with the educators to perform better in the exams. It is located at YUC the CSE department
the programming center is in computer Science and Engineering department at Yanbu University College. The website is helping students to book sessions with the educators
ProCenter website is for Programming center in CSE department, where you can book an appointment with an educator whenever you want.

patterns: How do I change or cancel a scheduled appointment?
How can I cancel the appointment ?
I want to cancel my appointment
responses: To cancel an appointment made online, visit the appointments page and press cancel button
Click on the cancel button in my appointment page to cancel the appointment
You can easily cancel your appointment online in the appointment page,and later you can book another appointment to with best time for you.

patterns: Who should I contact if I face a problem?
Is there a way to contact you?
After I contact you, how long does it take for a response?
Can I contact you if I had any suggestions?
responses: In the contact page on the menu bar  fill in all the required information with a description of your problem, and we will try to respond to you as fast as we can.
on the contact page which is on the menu bar you can contact us and we will respont to you as soon as possible.
You can contact us and we are going to respond within one to two days.
You can contact us from the contact page on the home menu bar and we will be happy for your suggestions
